description: Blocks caribou (the on screen keyboard) from popping up when you use a touchscreen. Even if it's disabled in the accessibility services menu. Continuation of keringar's work. Tested on GNOME Shell version 3.36 - 45 on Fedora 32 - 39 and GNOME Shell version 48 - 49 on Debian 13. For a higher version see https://github.com/lxylxy123456/cariboublocker#installing-on-high-gnome-shell-version .
name: Block Caribou 36
